item.title: Obsidian Weapons/Armour
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Pigrear, post:27, topic:336726”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=433137.msg3180770#msg3180770 date=1271283100]

i am just gonna stop posting models.
all you guys say is “it sucks and its rushed”
you don’t say why you think that.
but it’s whatever, i’m just gonna keep em to myself.
BTW: i’m in a Graphics Class in my Vocational Tech School.
But honestly, you guys can think what you want.
[/quote]OMG you take a class that’s entirely different from modeling. Think we give a fuck?

And since you’re complaining about the truth, you may as well stop posting models. They ARE rushed, they DO suck, so actually TAKE THE TIME AND EFFORT to make good ones.

This. They are totally different.
And if it’s not rushed, then maybe you just suck?
SSSLLLLLLOOOOOWWWWWWW DDDDDDDOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWNNNNNNNNNNN…

OH SNAP. Thats whats up.[/quote]
…

item.title: Obsidian Weapons/Armour
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“statsflamescape, post:15, topic:336726”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=433137.msg3179714#msg3179714 date=1271199916]
Flawless? Hardly.
It seriously looks like you took an obsidian knife and stretched it into these hideously shaped weapons. They are rushed, messy, and uneven. Take more time to work on them, because we prefer quality, not quantity.

Now remake these or make something that at least has SOME effort put into them.
[/quote]
Dude its better to start a rushed model and finish it later than make a model that people wont like even if it took really long to make it…
keep up the work! Darque star[/quote]
[size=36pt]INCORRECT. PLEASE TRY AGAIN.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Obsidian Weapons/Armour
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“statsflamescape, post:15, topic:336726”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=433137.msg3179714#msg3179714 date=1271199916]
Flawless? Hardly.
It seriously looks like you took an obsidian knife and stretched it into these hideously shaped weapons. They are rushed, messy, and uneven. Take more time to work on them, because we prefer quality, not quantity.

Now remake these or make something that at least has SOME effort put into them.
[/quote]
Dude its better to start a rushed model and finish it later than make a model that people wont like even if it took really long to make it…
keep up the work! Darque star[/quote]

I would rather kill myself than look at someones model who has been rushed. That is why I’m not even commenting on these, they are very rushed, and all of the blades are the same, just used differently. I have not even commented in this section in a long time because of the fact, people are rushing models to get quantity, and not realizing, if you were to make this into a career, sure, it must be done fast, but they must be good.

EDIT: Just so everybody knows, the ‘I would rather kill myself’ is just a figure of speech.

Read full topic

Dude its better to start a rushed model and finish it later than make a model that people wont like even if it took really long to make it…
keep up the work! Darque star[/quote]There is a fine line between liking something and something actually being good. People could hate your model but gain respect for making such a good one. So since you have no idea what you are talking about, shut up.

BASH AWAY!
